name: aliexpress.solution.product.post
description: Product posting API for Oversea merchants, simplifying the complexity of integration that sellers and merchants face. For example, these sellers can use their own category and attributes instead of mapping those from AE.

subParams.name: subject
subParams.description: Deprecated. Please use  multi_language_subject_list. 1-128 length, support multi language. Check the field "language" to find the supported languages.

subParams.name: description
subParams.description: Deprecated, please use product description, support html format and multi languages. Check the field language to find the supported languages.

subParams.name: language
subParams.description: The main language of the product. Aliexpress will depend on the subject and detail in main language to translate to other languages, if not filled in by sellers. Main language could not be modified after product has been uploaded. Support: en(English) ru(Russian) es(Spanish) fr(French) it(Italian) tr(Turkish) pt(Portuguese) de(German) nl(Dutch) in(Indonesian) ar(Arabic) ja(Japanese) ko(Korean) th(Thai) vi(Vietnamese) iw(Hebrew)

subParams.name: product_unit
subParams.description: Product Unit ID, Most common-used ID: 100000015 piece/pieces; 100000000:bag/bags; 100000001:barrel/barrels; 100000002:bushel/bushels; 100078580:carton; 100078581:centimeter; 100000003:cubic meter; 100000004:dozen; 100078584:feet; 100000005:gallon; 100000006:gram; 100078587:inch; 100000007:kilogram; 100078589:kiloliter; 100000008:kilometer; 100078559:liter/liters; 100000009:long ton; 100000010:meter; 100000011:metric ton; 100078560:milligram; 100078596:milliliter; 100078597:millimeter; 100000012:ounce; 100000014:pack/packs; 100000013:pair; 100000016:pound; 100078603:quart; 100000017:set/sets; 100000018:short ton; 100078606:square feet; 100078607:square inch; 100000019:square meter; 100078609:square yard; 100000020:ton; 100078558:yard/yards

subParams.name: multi_language_description_list
subParams.description: Please refer to https://developers.aliexpress.com/en/doc.htm?docId=108976&docType=1

subParams.name: language
subParams.description: Support: en(English) ru(Russian) es(Spanish) fr(French) it(Italian) tr(Turkish) pt(Portuguese) de(German) nl(Dutch) in(Indonesian) ar(Arabic) ja(Japanese) ko(Korean) th(Thai) vi(Vietnamese) iw(Hebrew)

subParams.name: web_detail
subParams.description: web detail for this language, please check the format here: https://developers.aliexpress.com/en/doc.htm?docId=109534&docType=1

subParams.name: mobile_detail
subParams.description: mobile detail for this language, please check the format here https://developers.aliexpress.com/en/doc.htm?docId=109534&docType=1

subParams.name: multi_language_subject_list
subParams.description: Please refer to https://developers.aliexpress.com/en/doc.htm?docId=108976&docType=1

subParams.name: subject
subParams.description: product subject, maximum length 128 characters.

subParams.name: language
subParams.description: Support: en(English) ru(Russian) es(Spanish) fr(French) it(Italian) tr(Turkish) pt(Portuguese) de(German) nl(Dutch) in(Indonesian) ar(Arabic) ja(Japanese) ko(Korean) th(Thai) vi(Vietnamese) iw(Hebrew)

subParams.name: group_id
subParams.description: group id, you can get group list from aliexpress.product.productgroups.get

subParams.name: extra_params
subParams.description: extra params. Configured some special products

subParams.name: marketing_images
subParams.description: marketing images for product. Currently supported 2 types: 1 represents 3:4 rectangle(resolution at least 750*1000) image while 2 represents 1:1 square image(Resolution at least 800*800). The image url needs to be obtained via uploading the image through Aliexpress API: aliexpress.photobank.redefining.uploadimageforsdk(https://developers.aliexpress.com/en/doc.htm?docId=30186&docType=2)

subParams.name: image_type
subParams.description: 1 represents 3:4 rectangle(resolution at least 750*1000) image while 2 represents 1:1 square image(Resolution at least 800*800).

subParams.name: image_url
subParams.description: The image url needs to be obtained via uploading the image through Aliexpress API: aliexpress.photobank.redefining.uploadimageforsdk(https://developers.aliexpress.com/en/doc.htm?docId=30186&docType=2)

subParams.name: aliexpress_category_id
subParams.description: Aliexpress leaf category ID, obtained through https://developers.aliexpress.com/en/doc.htm?docId=46042&docType=2

subParams.name: category_id
subParams.description: Deprecated. Please use aliexpress_category_id

subParams.name: brand_name
subParams.description: Brand name after applying in https://sellerjoin.aliexpress.com/oversea/getBrandList.htm. If the seller has not applied any brand permission, please leave this field blank.

subParams.name: main_image_urls_list
subParams.description: Main image that represents the product. The url should be accesible and there is a meximum of 6 pictures. The url can point to a seller's server or to AliExpress photobank. In order to obtain more information about the photobank and how to upload images, please visit the following page: https://developers.aliexpress.com/en/doc.htm?docId=30186&docType=2

subParams.name: attribute_list
subParams.description: There are 4 types of how to fill in the content of each element in this attribute list. 1). When filling in the standard dropdown/multi-dropdown attributes, fill in "aliexpress_attribute_name_id" and "aliexpress_attribute_value_id"(For multi-dropdown, splitting them into multiple elements)  2). When filling in the attributes in which the value needs to be manually entered, fill in "aliexpress_attribute_name_id" and "attribute_value" in the element. 3). There exists a special kind of "aliexpress_attribute_value_id" of which the value represents for "Other". When encoutering this scenario, please fill in "aliexpress_attribute_name_id", "aliexpress_attribute_value_id" and "attribute_value". 4). Besides the three types mentioned above, if the seller would like to fully customized all the atttributes, fill in  "attribute name" and "attribute_value" in the element.

subParams.name: attribute_value
subParams.description: merchant's attribute value

subParams.name: attribute_name
subParams.description: merchant's attribute name

subParams.name: aliexpress_attribute_value_id
subParams.description: aliexpress attribute value id, which could be obtained from https://developers.aliexpress.com/en/doc.htm?docId=29988&docType=2. The path is: result -> attributes ->values -> id

subParams.name: aliexpress_attribute_name_id
subParams.description: aliexpress attribute name id, which could be obtained from https://developers.aliexpress.com/en/doc.htm?docId=29988&docType=2. The path is: result -> attributes -> id

subParams.name: sku_info_list
subParams.description: All the skus included in one product.

subParams.name: bar_code
subParams.description: barcode of the sku. Except some Russian sellers who will be fulfilled by Aliexpress, please ignore this field for other sellers.

subParams.name: sku_attributes_list
subParams.description: sku attribute list. Some categories don't have sku attributes, then sku_attributes_list should be empty.

subParams.name: sku_image_url
subParams.description: Image that will represent the variation of the product. The url can point to a seller's server or to AliExpress photobank. In order to obtain more information about the photobank and how to upload images, please visit the following page: https://developers.aliexpress.com/en/doc.htm?docId=30186&docType=2

subParams.name: sku_attribute_value
subParams.description: Customized sku attribute value by sellers, do not include these 4 symbols #:=,

subParams.name: sku_attribute_name
subParams.description: Deprecated, please use sku_attribute_name_id. To obtain the available sku attribute names under a specific category, please check API: aliexpress.solution.sku.attribute.query.

subParams.name: sku_attribute_name_id
subParams.description: Please refer to https://developers.aliexpress.com/en/doc.htm?docId=29988&docType=2 to obtain the sku_attribute_name_id under specific category

subParams.name: sku_attribute_value_id
subParams.description: Please refer to https://developers.aliexpress.com/en/doc.htm?docId=29988&docType=2 to obtain the sku_attribute_value_id under specific category

subParams.name: inventory
subParams.description: stock. Maximum:999999, minumum:1

subParams.name: price
subParams.description: price. Maximum: 999999, minumum:0.01

subParams.name: sku_code
subParams.description: Merchant's identificator for the SKU. Important reference to maintain the sku relationship between merchant and Aliexpress.

subParams.name: discount_price
subParams.description: discount price for the sku. discount_price should be cheaper than price.

subParams.name: extra_params
subParams.description: extra params. Configured some special products

subParams.name: inventory_deduction_strategy
subParams.description: Indicate when the inventory of a specific product will be deducted:  1) place_order_withhold: the inventory is deducted just after the order is placed by customer.  2) payment_success_deduct: the stock is deducted after the payment is done successfully by the customer.

subParams.name: weight
subParams.description: Weight of the product, including package. Measured in Kilograms (Kg) with a maximum 500 and minumum 0.001

subParams.name: package_length
subParams.description: Package length, measured in centimeters (cm). Maximum 700 cm, minumum: 0.01cm

subParams.name: package_height
subParams.description: Package height measured in centimeters (cm). Maximum 700 cm, minumum: 0.01cm

subParams.name: package_width
subParams.description: Package width measured in centimeters (cm). Maximum 700 cm, minumum: 0.01cm

subParams.name: multi_country_price_configuration
subParams.description: multi country price configuration

subParams.name: price_type
subParams.description: Currently supporting only absolute. Please test carefully before uploading products.

subParams.name: country_price_list
subParams.description: Price list for different countries

subParams.name: ship_to_country
subParams.description: ISO code of the country. Currently supporting: RU, US, CA, ES, FR, UK, NL, IL, BR, CL, AU, UA, BY, JP, TH, SG, KR, ID, MY, PH, VN, IT, DE, SA, AE, PL, TR

subParams.name: sku_price_by_country_list
subParams.description: Sku price list under the same ship_to_country

subParams.name: sku_code
subParams.description: sku_code, the same as the sku_code in sku_info_list

subParams.name: value
subParams.description: Deprecated. Will be offline.

subParams.name: price
subParams.description: Value of price configuration. If the price of a specific country is set, it must be greater than or equal to 70% of the original sku price

subParams.name: discount_price
subParams.description: Value of discount_price for each country

subParams.name: freight_template_id
subParams.description: freight template ID. After the merchant has created an freight template in the backend: freighttemplate.aliexpress.com, the id could be obtained in the backend(freighttemplate.aliexpress.com) directly or thourgh the API: aliexpress.freight.redefining.listfreighttemplate.Please note that the default template with id:1000 is not applicable to oversea sellers.

subParams.name: size_chart_id
subParams.description: merchant's size chart id, more used in the category of shoes and clothes.

subParams.name: shipping_lead_time
subParams.description: refer to the preparation period of merchant before the package could be dispatched to the customer. Minimum:1

subParams.name: service_policy_id
subParams.description: service policy id, which could be set and obtained in the seller's background(https://cn.ae.aliexpress.com/sellerpromise/sellerPromiseHome.htm). If the merchant would like to use the default setting, pass "0" to this parameter.

subParams.name: product_id
subParams.description: When invoked successfully, Aliexpress will return a product Id.
